abstract: The move is part of a cost-cutting effort to deal with what it called “a weakening economy.”
snippet: The move is part of a cost-cutting effort to deal with what it called “a weakening economy.”
lead_paragraph: The television division of the Walt Disney Company announced Thursday that it would eliminate about 400 jobs from its work force of 6,500 to 7,000, as part of a cost-cutting effort to deal with what it called a weakening economy.

headline.main: Disney’s TV Unit Will Cut 400 Jobs
headline.print_headline: Disney’s TV Unit Will Cut 400 Jobs
